__parsed_extra: Ful Medames with Olive Oil, Salt, and Cumin
Fava beans, Olive oil, Cumin, Salt, Lemon
1. Soak and boil fava beans until tender (20 min). 2. Mash with olive oil, cumin, salt, and lemon juice. 3. Serve warm with baladi bread.
Use less olive oil or vegetable broth
Use sunflower oil instead of olive oil
Ful Medames with Lemon and Chili
Fava beans, Lemon juice, Chili powder, Olive oil, Salt
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Mash with lemon juice, chili powder, olive oil, and salt. 3. Serve with bread.
Use vegetable oil instead of olive oil
Ful Medames with Paprika and Fresh Herbs
Fava beans, Paprika, Parsley, Coriander, Olive oil
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Mash with paprika, chopped parsley, coriander, and olive oil. 3. Serve warm.
Use dried herbs instead of fresh
Ful Medames with Butter and Garlic
Fava beans, Butter, Garlic, Cumin, Salt
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Saut� garlic in butter, mix with beans, cumin, and salt. 3. Serve with bread.
Use olive oil instead of butter
Ful Medames with Ghee and Cumin
Fava beans, Ghee, Cumin, Salt, Lemon
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Mash with ghee, cumin, salt, and lemon juice. 3. Serve warm.
Use olive oil instead of ghee
Use vegetable oil instead of ghee
Ful Medames with Linseed Oil and Onions
Fava beans, Linseed oil, Onion, Cumin, Salt
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Saut� diced onion in linseed oil, mix with beans, cumin, and salt. 3. Serve warm.
Use vegetable oil instead of linseed oil
Ful Medames Topped with Diced Tomatoes and Cucumbers
Fava beans, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Mash with olive oil and lemon juice. 3. Top with diced tomatoes and cucumbers.
Omit olive oil, use lemon juice only
Ful Medames with Fried Egg and Tahini
Fava beans, Eggs, Tahini, Olive oil, Cumin
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Fry eggs in olive oil. 3. Mash beans with tahini and cumin, top with eggs.
Use boiled eggs instead of fried
Ful Medames with Boiled Egg and Roomi Cheese
Fava beans, Eggs, Roomi cheese, Olive oil, Salt
1. Boil fava beans and eggs separately. 2. Mash beans with olive oil and salt. 3. Top with crumbled Roomi cheese and sliced eggs.
Use feta instead of Roomi cheese
Ful Medames with Omelet and Sujuk
Fava beans, Eggs, Sujuk, Olive oil, Garlic
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Saut� sujuk and garlic in olive oil, make omelet. 3. Mash beans, top with omelet and sujuk.
Use minced beef instead of sujuk
Ful Medames with Pastirma and Garlic-Vinegar Sauce
Fava beans, Pastirma, Garlic, Vinegar, Olive oil
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Mix garlic and vinegar for sauce. 3. Mash beans with olive oil, top with pastirma and sauce.
Fava beans, Green peppers, Chili powder, Olive oil, Garlic
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Saut� diced green peppers and garlic in olive oil. 3. Mix with mashed beans, add chili powder, serve.
Sa'eedi Ful Medames (Rich Broth with Tomato)
Fava beans, Tomato, Onion, Olive oil, Cumin
1. Boil fava beans with diced tomato and onion for broth. 2. Mash with olive oil and cumin. 3. Serve warm with broth.
Use vegetable oil instead of olive oil
Fava beans, Yogurt, Garlic, Lemon, Salt
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Mix yogurt with minced garlic and lemon juice. 3. Mash beans, top with yogurt mix.
Use laban rayeb instead of yogurt
Ful Medames with Pomegranate Seeds and Mint
Fava beans, Pomegranate seeds, Mint, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Mash with olive oil and lemon juice. 3. Top with pomegranate seeds and chopped mint.
Lentil Soup (Shorbet Ads) with Carrots and Cumin
Lentils, Carrots, Cumin, Onion, Olive oil
"1. Saut� onion and carrots in olive oil. 2. Add lentils, cumin, and water
simmer 30 min. 3. Blend or serve chunky."
Use vegetable oil instead of olive oil
Spicy Lentil Soup with Chili and Lemon
Lentils, Chili powder, Lemon, Onion, Garlic
"1. Saut� onion and garlic. 2. Add lentils, chili powder, and water
simmer 30 min. 3. Add lemon juice, serve."
Use chili flakes instead of powder
Creamy Lentil Soup with Coconut Milk
Lentils, Coconut milk, Onion, Garlic, Cumin
"1. Saut� onion and garlic. 2. Add lentils, cumin, and coconut milk
Use milk instead of coconut milk
Koshary with Tomato-Garlic Sauce and Crispy Onions
1. Cook lentils, rice, and macaroni separately. 2. Blend tomatoes and garlic for sauce. 3. Fry onions, layer with components, serve with sauce.
Koshary with Harissa and Yogurt Sauce
1. Cook lentils, rice, and macaroni. 2. Mix harissa and yogurt for sauce. 3. Fry onions, layer with components, serve with sauce.
Koshary with Smoked Paprika and Black Lentils
Black lentils, Rice, Macaroni, Smoked paprika, Onions
1. Cook black lentils, rice, and macaroni. 2. Blend tomatoes with smoked paprika for sauce. 3. Fry onions, layer, serve with sauce.
Ads bi Hamod (Lentils with Lemon and Garlic)
Lentils, Lemon, Garlic, Olive oil, Salt
1. Boil lentils until tender. 2. Saut� garlic in olive oil, add lemon juice. 3. Mix with lentils, serve warm or cold.
Use vegetable oil instead of olive oil
Bissara (Fava Bean Dip) with Dill and Olive Oil
Fava beans, Dill, Olive oil, Garlic, Lemon
1. Boil fava beans until soft. 2. Blend with dill, garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice. 3. Serve as a dip with bread.
Use vegetable oil instead of olive oil
Bissara with Smoked Salt and Mint
Fava beans, Mint, Smoked salt, Olive oil, Garlic
1. Boil fava beans until tender. 2. Blend with mint, smoked salt, olive oil, and garlic. 3. Serve with bread.
1. Toast vermicelli in butter until golden. 2. Add rice, water, and salt. 3. Simmer until cooked (15 min).
Use olive oil instead of butter
Waraq Enab (Grape Leaves) with Rice and Herbs
Grape leaves, Rice, Parsley, Dill, Tomato
1. Mix rice, chopped parsley, dill, and diced tomato. 2. Wrap in grape leaves. 3. Simmer in pot with water and lemon for 45 min.
Waraq Enab with Rice, Minced Meat, and Dill
Grape leaves, Rice, Minced beef, Dill, Tomato
1. Mix rice, minced beef, dill, and diced tomato. 2. Wrap in grape leaves. 3. Simmer in pot with water for 45 min.
Waraq Enab in Tagine with Lamb Chops
Grape leaves, Rice, Lamb chops, Tomato, Garlic
1. Mix rice with diced tomato and garlic. 2. Wrap in grape leaves, place in tagine with lamb chops. 3. Bake at 180�C for 1 hr.
Kromb (Cabbage Leaves) with Spiced Rice and Tomato Sauce
Cabbage leaves, Rice, Tomato, Cumin, Onion
1. Mix rice with cumin and diced onion. 2. Wrap in cabbage leaves. 3. Simmer in tomato sauce for 45 min.
Koosa (Zucchini) Stuffed with Rice, Mint, and Lemon
Zucchini, Rice, Mint, Lemon, Olive oil
1. Hollow out zucchini. 2. Mix rice with mint, lemon juice, and olive oil. 3. Stuff zucchini, simmer in water for 40 min.
Koosa Stuffed with Bulgur and Chickpeas
1. Hollow out zucchini. 2. Mix bulgur, chickpeas, onion, and parsley. 3. Stuff zucchini, simmer in water for 40 min.
Batenjan (Eggplant) Stuffed with Rice and Pine Nuts
Eggplant, Rice, Pine nuts, Tomato, Garlic
1. Hollow out eggplant. 2. Mix rice, pine nuts, diced tomato, and garlic. 3. Stuff eggplant, bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Use sunflower seeds instead of pine nuts
Felfel (Bell Peppers) Stuffed with Rice, Beef, and Allspice
Bell peppers, Rice, Minced beef, Allspice, Tomato
1. Hollow out peppers. 2. Mix rice, beef, allspice, and diced tomato. 3. Stuff peppers, bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Tamatem (Tomatoes) Stuffed with Rice and Parsley
Tomatoes, Rice, Parsley, Olive oil, Garlic
1. Hollow out tomatoes. 2. Mix rice, parsley, olive oil, and garlic. 3. Stuff tomatoes, bake at 180�C for 40 min.
Batates (Potatoes) Stuffed with Minced Meat and Onions
Potatoes, Minced beef, Onion, Cumin, Tomato
1. Hollow out potatoes. 2. Mix beef, diced onion, cumin, and tomato. 3. Stuff potatoes, bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Mixed Mahshi Platter (Zucchini, Peppers, Grape Leaves)
Zucchini, Bell peppers, Grape leaves, Rice, Parsley
1. Mix rice and parsley. 2. Stuff zucchini, peppers, and grape leaves. 3. Simmer in pot with water for 45 min.
Use cabbage leaves for grape leaves
Mahshi with Saffron Rice and Almonds
Grape leaves, Rice, Saffron, Almonds, Lemon
1. Mix rice with saffron, almonds, and lemon juice. 2. Wrap in grape leaves. 3. Simmer in pot for 45 min.
Use sunflower seeds instead of almonds
Torly with Potatoes, Carrots, and Peas
1. Saut� onion and tomato. 2. Add diced potatoes, carrots, and peas. 3. Simmer with water for 30 min.
"1. Brown lamb in pot. 2. Add tomato, garlic, and coriander
simmer. 3. Add okra and water, cook for 1 hr."
Torly with Zucchini and Eggplant (Summer Variation)
1. Saut� onion and garlic. 2. Add diced zucchini, eggplant, and tomato. 3. Simmer for 30 min.
Bamia (Okra Stew) with Lamb and Tomato
"1. Brown lamb in pot. 2. Add chopped tomatoes, garlic, and coriander
simmer. 3. Add okra and water, cook for 1 hr."
Okra, Garlic, Coriander, Tomato, Olive oil
1. Saut� garlic and coriander in olive oil. 2. Add okra and chopped tomato. 3. Simmer for 30 min.
1. Saut� onion and garlic. 2. Add okra, chickpeas, and tomato. 3. Simmer for 30 min.
1. Boil chicken for broth. 2. Add chopped molokhia, simmer 10 min. 3. Saut� garlic and coriander in butter, stir into soup.
1. Boil rabbit for broth. 2. Add chopped molokhia, simmer 10 min. 3. Add lemon juice and saut�ed garlic-coriander mix.
1. Saut� shrimp with garlic and coriander. 2. Add chopped molokhia and water, simmer 10 min. 3. Add lemon juice, serve.
Molokhia with Beef and Roasted Garlic
1. Boil beef for broth. 2. Add chopped molokhia, simmer 10 min. 3. Roast garlic, saut� with coriander in butter, stir in.
Mesaka'a (Egyptian Moussaka) with Minced Meat and Tomato
Eggplant, Minced beef, Tomato, Onion, Garlic
1. Fry eggplant slices. 2. Cook minced beef with onion, garlic, and tomato. 3. Layer eggplant and meat, bake at 180�C for 30 min.
1. Fry eggplant slices. 2. Cook chickpeas with onion, garlic, and tomato. 3. Layer eggplant and chickpeas, bake at 180�C for 30 min.
Sabanegh (Spinach Stew) with Ground Beef and Rice
Spinach, Ground beef, Rice, Onion, Garlic
1. Saut� onion and garlic with beef. 2. Add spinach and rice, cook with water for 30 min. 3. Serve warm.
1. Saut� onion and garlic. 2. Add spinach, chickpeas, and lemon juice. 3. Simmer for 25 min.
Qolqas (Taro Root Stew) with Swiss Chard and Garlic
Taro root, Swiss chard, Garlic, Tomato, Olive oil
1. Saut� garlic and tomato. 2. Add diced taro and Swiss chard. 3. Simmer with water for 35 min.
Taro root, Lamb, Coriander, Tomato, Garlic
1. Brown lamb in pot. 2. Add tomato, garlic, and coriander. 3. Add taro, simmer for 1 hr.
Basella (Pea and Carrot Stew) with Chicken
1. Brown chicken in pot. 2. Add tomato, onion, peas, and carrots. 3. Simmer for 45 min.
Batates Mahshi (Stuffed Potatoes) with Spiced Beef
Potatoes, Minced beef, Onion, Cumin, Tomato
1. Hollow out potatoes. 2. Mix beef with onion, cumin, and tomato. 3. Stuff potatoes, bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Batates bi Laban (Potatoes in Yogurt Sauce)
Potatoes, Yogurt, Garlic, Lemon, Olive oil
1. Boil potatoes until tender. 2. Mix yogurt with garlic and lemon juice. 3. Toss potatoes in yogurt sauce, drizzle with olive oil.
Zucchini, Eggplant, Bell peppers, Tahini, Lemon
1. Slice zucchini, eggplant, and peppers. 2. Grill until charred. 3. Serve with tahini and lemon juice.
Stuffed Artichokes with Rice and Dill
Artichokes, Rice, Dill, Lemon, Olive oil
1. Clean artichokes, remove choke. 2. Mix rice with dill and lemon juice. 3. Stuff artichokes, simmer in water for 45 min.
Mahshi Lift (Turnips) with Rice and Parsley
Turnips, Rice, Parsley, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Hollow out turnips. 2. Mix rice with parsley and olive oil. 3. Stuff turnips, simmer with lemon juice for 40 min.
Grape leaves, Rice, Pomegranate molasses, Parsley, Tomato
1. Mix rice, parsley, and diced tomato. 2. Wrap in grape leaves, glaze with pomegranate molasses. 3. Simmer for 45 min.
Use lemon juice instead of molasses
Fennel, Leeks, Tomato, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Saut� garlic and tomato. 2. Add sliced fennel and leeks. 3. Simmer with water for 30 min.
Okra, Tamarind paste, Chili powder, Tomato, Garlic
1. Saut� garlic and tomato. 2. Add okra, tamarind paste, and chili powder. 3. Simmer for 30 min.
Use lemon juice instead of tamarind
Molokhia with Duck and Green Peppercorns
Molokhia, Duck, Green peppercorns, Garlic, Coriander
1. Boil duck for broth. 2. Add chopped molokhia and peppercorns, simmer 10 min. 3. Saut� garlic and coriander, stir in.
Cauliflower, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Fry cauliflower florets. 2. Cook tomato, onion, and garlic into sauce. 3. Layer cauliflower and sauce, bake at 180�C for 30 min.
Sabanegh with Lentils and Caramelized Onions
Spinach, Lentils, Onions, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Saut� onions until caramelized. 2. Add spinach, lentils, and garlic. 3. Simmer with water for 30 min.
Grilled Kofta with Parsley and Onion
Ground beef, Parsley, Onion, Cumin, Salt
1. Mix ground beef with parsley, onion, cumin, and salt. 2. Shape into skewers. 3. Grill over charcoal for 10-12 min.
Baked Kofta in Tomato Sauce with Potatoes
Ground beef, Potatoes, Tomato, Onion, Garlic
1. Mix beef with onion and garlic. 2. Shape into balls, place with sliced potatoes in dish. 3. Cover with tomato sauce, bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Kofta with Tahini and Pine Nuts
Ground beef, Tahini, Pine nuts, Onion, Cumin
1. Mix beef with onion and cumin, shape into balls. 2. Bake at 180�C for 20 min. 3. Top with tahini and pine nuts, bake 10 min.
Use sunflower seeds instead of pine nuts
Kebab Halla (Braised Beef) with Onions and Spices
Beef cubes, Onions, Garlic, Cumin, Tomato
1. Brown beef cubes in pot. 2. Add onions, garlic, cumin, and diced tomato. 3. Simmer with water for 1 hr.
Grilled Lamb Kebabs with Mint and Garlic
Lamb cubes, Mint, Garlic, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Marinate lamb with mint, garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice. 2. Skewer and grill for 10-12 min. 3. Serve hot.
Chicken breast, Breadcrumbs, Eggs, Flour, Oil
1. Pound chicken breasts thin. 2. Coat in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs. 3. Fry in oil until golden.
Roasted Chicken with Rosemary and Lemon
Chicken, Rosemary, Lemon, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Rub chicken with rosemary, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. 2. Roast at 180�C for 1 hr. 3. Serve with pan juices.
Chicken Tagine with Olives and Preserved Lemon
Chicken, Olives, Preserved lemon, Onion, Garlic
1. Brown chicken in pot. 2. Add onion, garlic, olives, and preserved lemon. 3. Simmer with water for 45 min.
Use fresh lemon instead of preserved
Fatta with Lamb and Garlic-Yogurt Sauce
1. Boil lamb for broth. 2. Toast bread, layer with yogurt and garlic sauce. 3. Add lamb and tomato sauce, serve.
Vegetarian Fatta with Chickpeas and Crispy Bread
1. Cook chickpeas in tomato sauce. 2. Toast bread, layer with yogurt and garlic. 3. Top with chickpeas, serve.
Kebda Eskandarani (Alexandrian Liver) with Chili and Lime
Beef liver, Chili powder, Lime, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Slice liver thinly. 2. Saut� with garlic, chili powder, and olive oil. 3. Add lime juice, serve hot.
Mombar (Stuffed Sausage) with Rice and Herbs
Sausage casings, Rice, Parsley, Dill, Tomato
1. Mix rice with parsley, dill, and diced tomato. 2. Stuff casings, tie ends. 3. Boil for 45 min, then fry lightly.
Use minced meat instead of casings
Beef trotters, Garlic, Lemon, Onion, Cumin
1. Boil trotters with onion and cumin for 2 hrs. 2. Add garlic and lemon juice. 3. Serve as soup.
Minced beef, Onion, Green pepper, Pita bread, Paprika
1. Mix beef with onion, pepper, and paprika. 2. Stuff into pita bread. 3. Bake at 200�C for 25 min.
Quail, Pomegranate molasses, Garlic, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Marinate quail with molasses, garlic, olive oil, and lemon. 2. Grill for 15 min. 3. Serve hot.
Duck with Orange and Honey Glaze
1. Rub duck with garlic and rosemary. 2. Roast at 180�C for 1 hr, glaze with orange juice and honey. 3. Roast 15 min more.
Stuffed Pigeon with Freekeh and Cinnamon
Pigeons, Freekeh, Cinnamon, Onion, Olive oil
1. Mix freekeh with onion, cinnamon, and olive oil. 2. Stuff pigeons. 3. Bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Lamb shanks, Rice, Saffron, Onion, Garlic
1. Brown lamb shanks. 2. Cook rice with saffron, onion, and garlic. 3. Simmer shanks with water for 1.5 hrs, serve with rice.
Chicken, Garlic, Yogurt, Lemon, Pita bread

Beef Shawarma with Tahini and Pickles
Beef, Tahini, Pickles, Onion, Pita bread
1. Marinate beef with onion. 2. Grill or bake, slice thinly. 3. Serve in pita with tahini and pickles.
Ground beef, Coriander, Cumin, Onion, Parsley
1. Mix beef with coriander, cumin, onion, and parsley. 2. Shape into skewers. 3. Grill for 10-12 min.
Baked Kibbeh with Pine Nuts and Mint
Ground beef, Bulgur, Pine nuts, Mint, Onion
1. Mix beef, bulgur, mint, and onion for filling. 2. Layer with pine nuts in dish. 3. Bake at 180�C for 45 min.
Use sunflower seeds instead of pine nuts
Grilled Fish with Tahini and Lemon (Sayadeya Style)
1. Marinate fish with lemon and garlic. 2. Grill for 15 min. 3. Serve with tahini and parsley.
Fried Fish with Cumin and Garlic
1. Coat fish in flour, cumin, and garlic. 2. Fry in oil until golden. 3. Serve with lemon.
1. Saut� prawns with garlic and coriander. 2. Add chopped molokhia and water, simmer 10 min. 3. Add lemon juice, serve.
Roasted Bone Marrow with Parsley Salad
Bone marrow, Parsley, Lemon, Onion, Olive oil
1. Roast marrow bones at 200�C for 20 min. 2. Mix parsley, onion, and lemon juice for salad. 3. Serve marrow with salad.
Use beef bones instead of marrow
Stuffed Lamb Shoulder with Rice and Almonds
Lamb shoulder, Rice, Almonds, Onion, Cumin
1. Mix rice with almonds, onion, and cumin. 2. Stuff lamb shoulder, sew shut. 3. Roast at 180�C for 1.5 hrs.
Chicken Liver with Pomegranate Molasses and Chili
Chicken liver, Pomegranate molasses, Chili powder, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Saut� liver with garlic and chili powder in olive oil. 2. Add pomegranate molasses. 3. Cook for 10 min, serve.
Use lemon juice instead of molasses
Braised Rabbit with Tomatoes and Thyme
1. Brown rabbit in pot. 2. Add tomatoes, onion, garlic, and thyme. 3. Simmer for 1 hr.
Grilled Sausages with Peppers and Onions
Sausages, Bell peppers, Onions, Garlic, Olive oil
1. Grill sausages until cooked. 2. Saut� peppers, onions, and garlic in olive oil. 3. Serve together.
Beef Kofta with Yogurt and Mint Sauce
Ground beef, Yogurt, Mint, Onion, Cumin
1. Mix beef with onion and cumin, shape into skewers. 2. Grill for 10-12 min. 3. Serve with yogurt and mint sauce.
Fried Kibbeh with Walnuts and Sumac
Ground beef, Bulgur, Walnuts, Sumac, Onion
1. Mix beef, bulgur, and onion for shell. 2. Fill with walnuts and sumac. 3. Fry until golden.
Lamb Chops with Rosemary and Garlic
Lamb chops, Rosemary, Garlic, Olive oil, Lemon
1. Marinate chops with rosemary, garlic, olive oil, and lemon. 2. Grill for 10-12 min. 3. Serve hot.
1. Brown chicken in pot. 2. Add freekeh, almonds, onion, and cumin. 3. Simmer with water for 45 min.
Stuffed Vine Leaves with Lamb and Rice
Grape leaves, Lamb, Rice, Onion, Parsley
1. Mix lamb, rice, onion, and parsley. 2. Wrap in grape leaves. 3. Simmer in pot for 45 min.
Feteer Meshaltet with Honey and Nuts
Feteer dough, Honey, Mixed nuts, Butter, Sugar
1. Roll out feteer dough thinly. 2. Layer with butter, bake at 200�C for 20 min. 3. Drizzle with honey and sprinkle nuts.
Feteer Meshaltet with Minced Meat and Onions
Feteer dough, Minced beef, Onion, Cumin, Olive oil
1. Cook beef with onion and cumin. 2. Layer in feteer dough. 3. Bake at 200�C for 25 min.
Feteer dough, Roomi cheese, Tomatoes, Olive oil, Parsley
1. Layer feteer dough with cheese and diced tomatoes. 2. Drizzle with olive oil. 3. Bake at 200�C for 20 min, top with parsley.
Feteer dough, Sujuk, Bell peppers, Olive oil, Garlic

Feteer dough, Spinach, Feta cheese, Onion, Olive oil

Goulash with Minced Meat and Cheese

1. Cook beef with onion. 2. Layer filo with beef and cheese. 3. Bake at 180�C for 25 min.
Filo pastry, Cream, Pistachios, Sugar, Rose water

Whole wheat flour, Water, Yeast, Salt, Olive oil
1. Mix flour, water, yeast, and salt into dough. 2. Knead and let rise for 1 hr. 3. Bake at 220�C for 15 min.

Potatoes, Flour, Parsley, Cumin, Olive oil

Semolina, Almonds, Sugar, Butter, Rose water

Konafa dough, Ricotta cheese, Sugar, Butter, Rose water

1. Mix flour, yeast, and water into dough. 2. Fry spoonfuls in oil until golden. 3. Dust with cinnamon sugar.

1. Mix semolina, butter, and sugar into dough. 2. Fill with dates and walnuts. 3. Bake at 180�C for 20 min.
Flour, Honey, Butter, Sesame seeds, Yeast

Use sugar syrup instead of honey
1. Mix flour, butter, sugar, and vanilla. 2. Shape into cookies, top with almonds. 3. Bake at 180�C for 15 min.
Coconut, Egg whites, Sugar, Flour, Vanilla

Feteer dough, Figs, Honey, Butter, Sugar

Filo pastry, Spinach, Ricotta, Onion, Olive oil

Flour, Fenugreek, Yeast, Water, Olive oil
1. Mix flour, fenugreek, yeast, and water. 2. Knead,
